meanings.definition: A member of a hill or mountain tribe, especially in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The montagnards lived peacefully in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the montagnards in our geography class.
meanings.sent3: The montagnards threw a mountain-themed party.
meanings.sent4: The montagnards stood tall like the mountains they called home.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the montagnards made them stand out in the hills.

meanings.definition: A supporter of the mountain people in Vietnam during the Vietnam War.
meanings.sent1: Many montagnards bravely fought alongside the mountain tribes.
meanings.sent2: The montagnards provided crucial assistance to the mountain communities.
meanings.sent3: The montagnards organized a fundraiser for the mountain villages.
meanings.sent4: She was a true montagnard, always standing up for the mountain people.
meanings.sent5: The loyalty of the montagnards to their mountain allies was unwavering.
